settings.showChatWhenNotActive.name: Show Chat when NOT Active
settings.showChatWhenNotActive.hint: When enabled the chat will be displayed to the right of sidebar when not the active sidebar tab.
settings.showChatWhenCollapsed.name: Show Chat when Collapsed
settings.showChatWhenCollapsed.hint: When enabled the chat will always be displayed when the sidebar is collapsed.
settings.onlyShowNewMessages.name: Only Show New Messages
settings.onlyShowNewMessages.hint: When enabled only newly registered messages will Show Up.
settings.delayNewMessagesFadeOut.name: Hide New Messages After
settings.delayNewMessagesFadeOut.hint: WYou can adjust the time that a new message stays available for in seconds. Setting this value to 0 Means the message will stay until you refresh the screen or if it falls below your Number of Messages to Show setting.
settings.numberOfMessagesToDisplay.name: Number of Messages to Show
settings.numberOfMessagesToDisplay.hint: You can adjust this setting to adjust the number of messages shown. Setting this to 0 will allow 999 messages to be shown. Please note that there is no scroll bar and you wont be able to interact with messages that out of your browsers height.
settings.inactiveScale.name: Scale of Inactive Chat
settings.inactiveScale.hint: You can adjust the scale of the chat sidebar when its inactive to get it more out of the way.
settings.inactiveOpacity.name: Scale of Opacity Chat
settings.inactiveOpacity.hint: You can adjust the opacity of the chat messages when they are not hovered over.
